Detailed Description

Trace channel for DSI-Tracing. The user-provided implementation must implement

Open an output stream for the given interface.

Returns:

const DSI::MessageHeader *  hdr,
const DSI::EventInfo *  info,
const void *  payload,
size_t  len 
) [pure virtual]

Write a complete DSI frame. The info pointer may be null in case of non-data (dis-/connect request) or further-data requests (in case of large DSI requests).

Implemented in CStdoutTracer.
